description: Replacement maturity model for frankenlibc. Defines four levels from LD_PRELOAD interposition to full standalone replacement, with measurable gate criteria for each level transition.

levels.name: Interpose
levels.description: LD_PRELOAD interposition over host glibc. Call-throughs to host glibc allowed for all modules. Primary value: membrane validation + structured logging on top of host libc.

levels.name: Hardened Interpose
levels.description: LD_PRELOAD with hardened mode active. All call-throughs validated by membrane. Healing actions applied for safety-critical APIs. Stubs eliminated — all symbols either Implemented, RawSyscall, or GlibcCallThrough.

gate_criteria.test_gate: cargo test --workspace + E2E smoke suite passes in both modes

blockers: E2E smoke harness needs hardened mode validation

levels.name: Partial Replacement
levels.description: Standalone for core subsystems. stdio/pthread still delegate to host glibc but all other modules use raw syscalls or native Rust. Suitable for containers and minimal environments.
levels.deployment: Direct link or LD_PRELOAD (host glibc for stdio/pthread only)

gate_criteria.test_gate: Full test suite + C fixture suite + perf benchmarks
additional: dlfcn_abi migrated to raw syscall or eliminated
Replacement profile guard passes in interpose mode with zero violations outside stdio/pthread

blockers: dlfcn_abi call-throughs (4 symbols) need raw syscall migration
C fixture suite (bd-3jh) not yet built

levels.name: Full Replacement
levels.description: Complete standalone glibc replacement. Zero host glibc dependency. All symbols either Implemented or RawSyscall. Requires custom CRT, rtld, and NSS/locale/resolver backends.

gate_criteria.test_gate: Full test suite + C fixtures + real binary workload matrix + perf parity
additional: pthread implemented via futex (no host pthread)

blockers: pthread_abi: 5 call-throughs need futex-based implementation (bd-z84, bd-yos)

release_tag_policy.description: Release tags must encode exactly one replacement maturity level and must not claim a level above current_level.

L1_to_L2: Migrate dlfcn_abi to raw syscall or eliminate
Replacement profile guard passes with only stdio/pthread exceptions
